mapper.select: select m.member_no, m.userid, m.real_name, m.userphone, c.business_register_no, c.name, c.tel, c.address1, c.address2, j.proj_id, j.proj_title, j.proj_start_date, j.proj_end_date from member m join client c on m.member_no = c.member_no join project j on c.member_no = j.member_no where m.member_no = #{source_no} and j.proj_id = #{proj_id}
select m.member_no, m.userid, m.real_name, m.userphone, p.birthday from member m join partners p on m.member_no = p.member_no where m.member_no = #{target_no}
mapper.insert: insert into contract ( CONTRACT_ID, CONTRACT_WRITE_SOURCE, CONTRACT_REG_DATE, RELATED_PROJ, CONTRACT_WRITE_TARGET, source_signature ) values('cont'||contract_seq.nextval, #{contract_write_source}, sysdate, #{related_proj}, #{contract_write_target}, #{source_signature})
